summary.span: 包装计算项以进行生成。

span.span: Wraps an evaluated item for build purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不存储项元素信息，因为已经执行了所有计算和验证。Does not store item element information, because all evaluation and verification has already been performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这会搜索项定义中的内置元数据和元数据，因为此方法用于批处理，在这种情况下，元数据的起源位置并不重要。This searches built-in metadata and metadata from item definitions, because this method is used for batching, where it doesn't matter where the metadata originated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法时，请遵循以下指导原则。Follow the guidelines below when implementing this method. - 不要覆盖 属性。Do not overwrite the property. - 不要覆盖现有元数据条目。Do not overwrite existing metadata entries. - 不要复制对目标项没有意义的元数据项。Do not copy metadata entries that do not make sense on the destination item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项规范是任意字符串。The item specification is an arbitrary string. 如果项表示磁盘上的文件，则项规范将是该文件的路径。If the item represents a file on disk, the item specification will be the path of that file. 项目文件中以下项声明的 是 `File.cs`的。The for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建一个或多个目录的任务的代码。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]
